title: Impersonating a law enforcement officer in the
context: [ยง710-1016.6] Impersonating a law enforcement officer in the first degree. (1) A person commits the offense of impersonating a law enforcement officer in the first degree if, with intent to deceive, the person pretends to be a law enforcement officer and is armed with a firearm. (2) Impersonating a law enforcement officer in the first degree is a class C felony. [L 1987, c 130, pt of ยง3]
